You can banish this card from your Graveyard; Fusion Summon 1 "Buster Blader, the Dragon Destroyer Swordsman" from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your Graveyard.

MP17-EN221.name: Cipher Spectrum
MP17-EN221.desc: If a "Cipher" Xyz Monster(s) you control that has Xyz Material is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect and sent to your Graveyard: Target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck with the same name as that Xyz monster.

MP17-EN177.name: Fusion Parasite
MP17-EN177.desc: This card can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material whose name is specifically listed on the Fusion Monster Card, but the other Fusion Material(s) must be correct. Cannot be used as Fusion Material otherwise. If this card is Special Summoned (except during the Damage Step): You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control as Fusion Materials, including this card.

MP17-EN073.name: Magician's Robe
MP17-EN073.desc: During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Spell/Trap; Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your Deck. During your opponent's turn, if you activate a Spell/Trap Card or effect while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Magician's Robe" once per turn.

MP17-EN144.name: Doki Doki
MP17-EN144.desc: You can discard 1 Rock monster; Special Summon from your Deck, 1 Rock monster that has the same original Attribute and Level as that monster, in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Doki Doki" once per turn.

MP17-EN166.name: Dino-Sewing
MP17-EN166.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is targeted for an attack: This card gains 1000 ATK and DEF. If this card attacked, after damage calculation: The ATK and DEF gained from this effect returns to 0.

CROS-IT054.name: Frightfur Factory
CROS-IT054.desc: You can banish 1 "Polymerization" Spell Card or "Fusion" Spell Card from your Graveyard, except "Diffusion Wave-Motion"; Fusion Summon 1 "Frightfur" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 of your banished "Frightfur Fusion"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Frightfur Factory" once per turn.

CROS-SP012.name: Edge Imp Saw
CROS-SP012.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Fluffal" monster from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 2 cards, then place 1 card from your hand on either the top or bottom of your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Edge Imp Saw" once per turn.

CROS-SP013.name: Edge Imp Chain
CROS-SP013.desc: When this card declares an attack: You can add 1 "Edge Imp Chain" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent from the hand or field to the Graveyard: You can add 1 "Frightfur" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Edge Imp Chain" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

CROS-SP035.name: Deskbot 004
CROS-SP035.desc: If this card battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation (in either player's turn): You can activate this effect once per battle; your opponent takes no battle damage for the rest of this turn, also send 1 "Deskbot" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard, except "Deskbot 004", and if you do, this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the sent monster's Level x 500, during damage calculation only. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can Special Summon 2 "Deskbot" monsters with different Levels from your hand and/or Graveyard in Defense Position.

CROS-SP080.name: Diceversity
CROS-SP080.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field whose current Level is different from its original Level; roll a six-sided die and that monster's Level becomes the same as the result.

CROS-EN078.name: Statue of Anguish Pattern
CROS-EN078.desc: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Rock-Type/EARTH/Level 7/ATK 0/DEF 2500). (This card is also still a Trap Card.) If Summoned this way, this card cannot be targeted by an opponent's card effects while you control another Trap Card that is a monster. If a card is Special Summoned from your Spell & Trap Zone to the Monster Zone while this card is a monster: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

CROS-EN077.name: Abyss Stungray
CROS-EN077.desc: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Thunder-Type/LIGHT/Level 5/ATK 1900/DEF 0). (This card is also still a Trap Card.) If Summoned this way, this card cannot be destroyed by battle.

CROS-EN036.name: Doomdog Octhros

CROS-EN090.name: Half Unbreak

CROS-EN076.name: Fiend Griefing

CROS-EN035.name: Deskbot 004
CROS-EN035.desc: If this card battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation (in either player's turn): You can activate this effect once per battle; your opponent takes no battle damage for the rest of this turn, also send 1 "Deskbot" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard, except "Deskbot 004", and if you do, this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the sent monster's Level x 500, during damage calculation only. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can Special Summon 2 "Deskbot" monsters with different Levels from your hand and/or Graveyard in Defense Position.

CROS-EN022.name: Shaddoll Zefranaga
CROS-EN022.desc:

You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shaddoll" and "Zefra" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
----------------------------------------

CROS-EN013.name: Edge Imp Chain
CROS-EN013.desc: When this card declares an attack: You can add 1 "Edge Imp Chain" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Edge Imp Chain" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

CROS-EN054.name: Frightfur Factory
CROS-EN054.desc: You can banish 1 "Polymerization" Spell Card or "Fusion" Spell Card from your Graveyard, except "Diffusion Wave-Motion"; Fusion Summon 1 "Frightfur" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials. DCR-039.name: Rod of the Mind's Eye

RATE-SP080.name: Massivemorph

RATE-EN080.name: Massivemorph
RATE-EN080.desc: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its ATK and DEF become double its current ATK and DEF, but it cannot attack directly.

RATE-EN029.name: Apprentice Piper

FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand.
If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand.

RATE-EN093.desc: Target 1 Attack Position monster you control with 800 or more ATK; equip this card to that target. It gains 800 ATK. You can only use 1 "Rocket Hand" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

RATE-EN067.name: Terminal World NEXT
RATE-EN067.desc: Activate this card if your opponent controls 3 or fewer monsters and 3 or fewer Spell/Trap Cards, while you control no other cards. Cards cannot be placed on the field if it would give any player more than 3 monsters or more than 3 Spell/Trap Cards on their field.

RATE-SP093.name: Rocket Hand
RATE-SP093.desc: Target 1 Attack Position monster you control with 800 or more ATK; equip this card to that target. It gains 800 ATK. You can send this equipped card to the Graveyard, then target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it, then change the ATK of the monster this card was equipped to, to 0, also its battle position cannot be changed. You can only use 1 "Rocket Hand" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

BP01-EN102.name: Skill Successor
BP01-EN102.desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn. During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster you control; that target gains 800 ATK until the end of this turn.

BP01-EN217.name: Shine Knight
BP01-EN217.desc: This card is Level 4 while in face-up Defense Position.

BP01-EN146.name: Ancient Gear Knight

This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.
● If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.

BP01-EN089.name: Windstorm of Etaqua
BP01-EN089.desc: Change the battle positions of all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

DUEA-SP068.name: Battleguard Rage
DUEA-SP068.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Warrior-Type monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK. Monsters destroyed by battle with it are returned to the hand instead of going to the Graveyard. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

DUEA-EN069.desc: When a Warrior monster you control is targeted for an attack, or by an opponent's monster effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the original ATK of the face-up monster you targeted with this card, and if you do, return it to the hand.

DUEA-ENSP1.name: Dragon Horn Hunter
DUEA-ENSP1.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
All Normal Monsters gain 200 ATK. You take no battle damage from battles involving Normal Monsters you control.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]
The horns were needed to prepare a medicine for her village, suffering from a plague. Unknown to her, the dragons burned and trampled her village, once displaced from their den.

You can only activate 1 "The Monarchs Stormforth" per turn. During the turn you activate this card, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck.

2 Level 4 monsters
While you control no other cards on the field, this card is unaffected by other cards' effects. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; destroy as many other cards you control as possible, then this card gains 300 ATK until the end of this turn for each monster destroyed by this effect and sent to the Graveyard.

STOR-EN078.desc: Tribute 2 monsters. Effects of Effect Monsters that activate in the hand or on the field cannot be activated.

STOR-EN045.name: Nordic Relic Draupnir

STOR-EN028.name: Karakuri Ninja mdl 919 "Kuick"
STOR-EN028.desc: This card must attack if able. When this face-up card is selected as an attack target, change its battle position.
